leve.name: Knowledge Is Power
leve.description: The magick of the Ronkan Empire was without peer, and it is our hope that a better understanding of their expertise will allow us to better fortify the cannons we use to keep the sin eaters at bay. It is said the land surrounding Fruit of the Protector is imbued with its power. As a result, the rocks there are highly conductive to aether, making it ideal to use in their rituals. We would know more of these stones, and how they might benefit the Crystarium.
